00021 class TDesignerGuiCompBase: public TGuiComponentBase<WidgetType>, public UI

00023 public:
00024        typedef TGuiComponentBase<WidgetType> BaseClass;

00039 template <class UI, class WidgetType>
00040 QWidget* TDesignerGuiCompBase<UI, WidgetType>::InitWidgetToParent(QWidget* parentPtr)
00041 {
00042        I_ASSERT(!BaseClass::IsGuiCreated());
00043 
00044        QWidget* widgetPtr = BaseClass::InitWidgetToParent(parentPtr);
00045 
00046        WidgetType* concreteWidgetPtr = dynamic_cast<WidgetType*>(widgetPtr);
00047        I_ASSERT(concreteWidgetPtr != NULL);
00048 
00049        UI::setupUi(concreteWidgetPtr);
00050 
00051        return concreteWidgetPtr;
00052 }

00057 // reimplemented (iqtgui::CGuiComponentBase)

00059 template <class UI, class WidgetType>
00060 void TDesignerGuiCompBase<UI, WidgetType>::OnGuiRetranslate()
00061 {
00062        WidgetType* widgetPtr = dynamic_cast<WidgetType*>(BaseClass::GetWidget());
00063        if (widgetPtr != NULL){
00064               UI::retranslateUi(widgetPtr);
00065        }
00066 
00067        BaseClass::OnGuiRetranslate();
00068 }
